chapter.title: Download
chapter.para: You need to download the binaries for Teiid . Note that there are three different artifacts are available for download.

listitem.para: Teiid Source - contains all the source code for all modules
Teiid Adminshell - contains the admin client binary code
Teiid Kit - contains only required modules and their required 3rd party dependencies

chapter.para: For this Quick Start, download and install JBoss AS 5.1.0. Then download Teiid runtime and unzip the contents of the Teiid under any of one of the JBoss AS profiles like "default" or "all". For example in "<jboss-install>/server/default". The Teiid runtime directory structure matches that of the JBoss profile directly, so you can just overlay the needed classes.

In the "<jboss-install>/server/<profile>/lib" directory, you will find "teiid-${version}-client.jar", which is the main client binary jar file for Teiid. This jar file contains the Teiid's JDBC driver and data source classes.

note.para: JBoss AS requires Java 6 to run.

Access to physical data sources such as Oracle, MS-SQL Server, DB2, and Sybase through Teiid relies upon the user supplying their own JDBC drivers in the deployment. Copy the JDBC driver files into "<jboss-install>/server/<profile>/lib" before you create any data sources.
